artist: Designer: Louis W. Rice; Manufacturer: Bernard Rice's Sons, Inc.
creditline: The Modernism Collection, gift of Norwest Bank Minnesota
description: Oxydized handles; skyscraper with smokestack as handle
markings: \'Skyscraper/Apollo E.P.N.S./Made in U.S.A. by Bernard Rice\'s Sons, Inc./5259\' on bottom
text: Designers of accessories for the urban home soon drew on the "vertical" city's premier 1920s emblem, the skyscraper, as an appropriate design motif. Its terraced step-back form provided the inspiration for a host of home furnishings, including this "Skyscraper" tea and coffee set by Louis W. Rice.
title: Teapot for "Apollo Sky-Scraper" set
